name: terminal-control
description: A MCP server that enables secure terminal command execution, directory navigation, and file system operations through a standardized interface.

tools.name: execute_command
tools.description:
Execute terminal command and return results
    
    Args:
        command: Command line command to execute
        timeout: Command timeout in seconds, default is 30 seconds
    
    Returns:
        Output of the command execution

tools.name: get_command_history
tools.description:
Get recent command execution history
    
    Args:
        count: Number of recent commands to return
    
    Returns:
        Formatted command history record

tools.name: get_current_directory
tools.description:
Get current working directory
    
    Returns:
        Path of current working directory

tools.name: change_directory
tools.description:
Change current working directory
    
    Args:
        path: Directory path to switch to
    
    Returns:
        Operation result information

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description:
List files and subdirectories in the specified directory
    
    Args:
        path: Directory path to list contents, default is current directory
    
    Returns:
        List of directory contents
